title: PAREVE (NON-DAIRY) CAESAR DRESSING
directions: 1 Put grated garlic, lemon juice, Worcestershire and dijon in bowl.
2 Whisk in mayonaisse, then whisk in olive oil and add salt and pepper to taste.
I love Caesar salad and this dressing works great as a pareve Caesar salad, you could always add Parmesan if you are going dairy.
ingredients: 1 clove garlic, finely chopped or grated
1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce (can use anchovy paste if preferred)
